      • onlyName

        public boolean onlyName(java.lang.String nameAuditorium)
        onlyName

        desc:

        This method receives a name entered with the user to validate that it is not on the list and otherwise request the name again. All this is done after a tour of the list comparing the existing names with the one entered
        Returns:
        the method returns a boolean that confirms whether the name was repeated or not
